Description: this is an older RG model. I only bought this thing for 300 bucks about 5 years ago because I broke the headstock off of my other guitar during a USA tour. I recorded a freedumb album with it and a solo record. I used it live for a while with skull fist as well until I bought a V. Theres a bunch of pictures online, i think i had it painted black and white for a while. I don't want to lead anyone on or something. the action is pretty high, one of the tuning pegs is a little bit sloppy but works ok. on the 3rd fret the steel divider thing sticks out a tiny tiny bit down at the high E string. depending on how you bend it gets hung up for me but its so rare that I've never bothered to fix it. Its an easy fix, just needs like 1 minute of filing it down so the edge dont stick out. As I said, I never bothered to fix it since it was such a rare thing but Ive always noticed it. The bridge pickup works fine but the screw is out of place, it just needs one of those little springs but I also never bothered to fix it because its stock pickups. IF you plan on actually playing this guitar Id suggest just putting in a new bridge pickup but the neck one is actually not to bad of a sound. The paint job was me with spray paint. Its a really beat up guitar but if it gets set up properly will play fine. I was still using it and practicing and recording with it up until a week ago but was just given a sweet sheckter or however you spell it. I don't really like holding on to things if i don't need to so i figure if someone wants it, why not. Just remember, I only paid 300 bucks for this. It definitely has a lot of history with skull fist and my own music but I really don't think its worth over 300 bucks unless you want it for sentimental reasons or whatever but even then. Don't get silly because if this amount goes to high I will just refund a portion or something like that. I can ship it with the chain strap if you like, or not. up to you. lets just figure out the shipping cost afterwards. I'll have to send it in a box and I'll take the neck off for shipping. I'll pack it up nice and comfortable though.
Title: Ibanez RG crappy paint job (LEFT)
